etymologies: mid 16th century: from Old French, pet form of the given name Robert

definitions: a large New World thrush that typically has a reddish breast.

notes.text: genus Turdus, subfamily Turdinae, family Muscicapidae, in particular the American robin (T. migratorius)

shortDefinitions: large New World thrush with reddish breast

definitions: any of a number of other birds that resemble the American robin, especially in having a red breast, in particular a small Old World thrush related to the chats, typically having a brown back with red on the breast or other colorful markings.

notes.text: Erithacus and other genera, subfamily Turdinae, family Muscicapidae: numerous species, in particular the European robin (E. rubecula)

shortDefinitions: small Old World thrush related to chats
